comments:

package xy;

public enum Color {
    RED, GREEN(), BLUE(17), PINK(1) {/*anon*};
    Color() {}
    Color(int i) {}
}

Are you sure you are using 1.0.4? This is fixed there.

Indeed taking again 1.0.4 worked. Are you sure you didn't fix this bug without
changing the version of the ASTView plugin? I could see 1.0.4 in the Plugin
details view.

Yes, 1.0.4 was done just before M5, no reuse here. Maybe a problem which having
the plugin in several versions at the same time in your install?
